content: worry worm by wilky wooly thank you for downloading my pattern please visit my facebook group wilky wooly designs to get instant updates of new & free patterns and share your finished work this pattern is for the worry worm it is worked using american crochet terms size approx 13cm high it can be made longer by increasing the amount of chains in the second chain you will need 3 5mm crochet hook aran yarn 20mm wooden face bead needle scissors abbreviations st stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet fo fasten_off worry worm ch35 slip_stitch in 1st chain ch21 5hdc in 2nd chain from the hook 5hdc in next 18ch slip_stitch in last chain fo tie the 2 ends together slot the chain loop & the 2 ends through the bead head cut the ends off & tie a knot in the chain loop and that s it you re done
